boardgame.name: Sagospelet Äventyr: 6. Förtrollningar (4th Edition)
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Sagospelet Äventyr är saga, rollspel, lek och pyssel på samma gång. Under spelet skapar ni en berättelse i den magiska världen Masona där ni upplever fantastiska äventyr.

Berätta en saga tillsammans och låt spelarna lösa problem, övervinna hinder och få belöningar i slutet av sagan. Kombinera spelet med pyssel, lekar och aktiviteter för de yngsta, allt i samma värld. Rid på drakar, besök undervattensstäder, rädda prinsar från farliga monster och bli hjältar!

boardgame.name: Sagospelet Äventyr: 7. Arter & Sysselsättningar (4th Edition)
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Sagospelet Äventyr, häfte 7: Arter & Sysselsättningar innehåller nya arter, sysselsättningar, vikfigurer och kartor att använda när ni spelar.

Sagospelet Äventyr är saga, rollspel, lek och pyssel på samma gång. Under spelet skapar ni en berättelse i den magiska världen Masona där ni upplever fantastiska äventyr.

Berätta en saga tillsammans och låt spelarna lösa problem, övervinna hinder och få belöningar i slutet av sagan. Kombinera spelet med pyssel, lekar och aktiviteter för de yngsta, allt i samma värld. Rid på drakar, besök undervattensstäder, rädda prinsar från farliga monster och bli hjältar!

boardgame.name: Heroes of Erkusaa
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Come to Mist-Shrouded Isle of Erkusaa

Play as erkunae, doathi, dhosari, motherless tieflings, musetouched aasimar, pitborn tiefling, plumekith aasimar, simhalan, or xaoling
Explore the halls and towers of the greatest city on all of Porphyra, G’sho’laa’n’rr
Immerse yourself the chaos of wild magic
Train and fight in Erkusaa as a decadent noble (fighter), the Emperor’s Nurse (champion cause), fate sailor (eldritch knight), knifespeaker (inquisitor), mage of the promise (wizard), shadow child (rogue), or tortured thrall (fighter)
Ravage your opponents with new demon lord, erkunae, Morcheox, Pasiphae, and protean lord spells.
Hoard strange new artifacts and magic items.
Strengthen your training with a host of new feats.

boardgame.name: The Death Knight
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

A Prestige Class for 5E from the Realm Scribe!

The death knight is made when paladin falls before fulfilling their oath and makes a pact with a powerful being to get a second chance, or when a warlock in service of the forces of death swears an oath that gives them power beyond their patron. They are transformed into an undead creature, but left with their own mind and will. They can use the power of their patron to make their very presence spread disease, encase themselves in protective ice, and fill their own servants with the draining power of undeath.

This class is for high-level campaigns that allow for multi-classing in order for a character to meet the requirements for this Prestige Class. It is designed to fuse together the idea of a bound warlock and an oathsown paladin into a champion of undeath, and requires high charmisa and strength, levels in both the paladin and warlock classes, and to be at least 10th level before taking a level in this class. Prestige Classes are very powerful and meant for high threat campaigns.

boardgame.name: Encounter Bundle #1
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

A compilation of 5e encounters for various settings, levels and pillars of gameplay.

Whether you want to fight, explore, or roleplay, you can be certain that you'll find a suiting encounter in this document. These 12 encounters cover a variety of settings and gameplays. Exploration, roleplay and combat are always prominent, one was or another.

Saving people from fiery buildings, dancing to receive boons, fighting against necromancers and zombie whales... Encounter Bundle #1 covers it all!

The bundle is a collection of encounters released by Adventure Bundles. We are content creators for 5e and release monthly adventures and encounters for it.

With this adventure you get:

12 encounters
10 battle maps
1 tracker map
13 handouts (12 printable playing cards and 1 puzzle)

boardgame.name: Mighty Tiny: Tales of the Old Empire
boardgame.description:
Publisher blurb:
"In a distant future, Man is long gone, but the mice and rats have evolved and developed their own modern societies, complete with commerce, transportation, education, family values, friendships, prejudices... and war. While an uneasy peace exists between the nations of Mousputa and Ratveria, subversive forces are at work to make sure it doesn't last, forces willing to use the terrible weapons of ancient Man! It's up to you to make sure that Rodentkind does not follow Man into extinction!

In this setting, developed by Ben Dunn (Ninja High School, Warrior Nun Areala), you can play a mouse or a rat. You are soldiers, explorers and diplomats, searching the wilderness for anything that could help maintain the peace between the two nations.

This setting utilizes the OneDice engine published by Cakebread & Walton."

boardgame.name: Der Perfekte Moment: Die Sherlock-Erweiterung
boardgame.description:
A murder has happened! It could have been anyone - even the dog! But Sherlock Holmes is already investigating. Will you provide the master detective with the crucial clues? Or will you side with the murderer?

The murderer has mingled with the mourners. Talk to those present to find out who has an alibi. But be careful not to reveal too much of what you've found out to the other photographers!

Add an all-new game mode to your perfect moment! Find out who the culprit is and set Sherlock and Watson up to either catch him or let him escape!

The stakes have never been so high. Can you take the best photo under such conditions?

To play with 5-6 people, you will need the 5-6 player expansion in addition to the basic game.

-Translated from the crowdfunding page

boardgame.name: Galactic Battle Game
boardgame.description:
A simple multiplayer game where you select pieces to move a spring loaded bar.

Selecting the right piece so that the bar does not move is key to victory and each piece has a different hidden point value.

The game is quite luck driven and plays in 5-10 minutes
Tagline "choose carefully or the enemy will strike"

boardgame.name: The Search for the Seastone - Part 2
boardgame.description:
From Patreon:

The Search for the Seastone continues with this second part of the adventure. Discover the twists and turns of an incredible undersea labyrinth as you probe deeper into its depths and perhaps you will discover some surprises as you go...

Good luck Roomlanders...

boardgame.name: New Alchemy
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

In the dark of night the Voidling stalks you. Thirsting for your soul, this unique monster fits right at home in a haunted forest inn, a peculiar country village, or haunted convent. The worst part, is that the nature of this creation prevents you from really knowing who to trust!

This supplement introduces a new ferocious predator, something new for you to experience and designed specifically to supplement horror encounters for low-level players.

boardgame.name: Yoshida: Stealth Ship
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Incorporating hybrid Cyntek systems, the Yoshida-class was built as a long-range stealth and reconnaissance vessel - designed to operate deep behind enemy lines. It is equipped like a bomber or missile boat but can carry spy drones and other specialty ordnance in addition to warheads and biologicals. She supports a crew of six as well as a stealth-enabled shuttle and could serve as an excellent vessel for a party of adventurers or mercenaries.

The Yoshida Stealth ship employs some hardware not commonly found on today’s spacecraft. A proprietary stealth field generator is at the core of the design. When coupled with the hybrid hull material it can render the ship invisible to visual and most electronic sensor systems. Cryogenic chambers are included to allow for extended range and loiter times. In order to allow for both strike sorties and wide surveillance coverage, a versatile delivery system was incorporated that can handle a wide variety of missiles, bombs, and probes or drones interchangeably.

Basically a passenger jet for interstellar travel, the Yoshida Transport variant was spun off from the stealth project in its early stages. Developed to haul a large number of passengers over interstellar distances, it has a total of 232 passenger seats but no passenger cabins or bunks. Like the stealth variant, it uses advanced Cyntek engines for impressive speed.

The Yoshida package contains four highly detailed, layered PDF files and a pair of big jpeg images:

• Main Book
- 23 page PDF file detailing the ships and interior areas.
- Contains 3D rendered scenes as well as orthographic views of the ships in various themes.
- Includes system independent statistics designed for easy adaptation to your game of choice.
- Background, art, and text are on different layers for custom display and printing.

• Map Pages
- 29 page PDF file containing complete interior maps and assembly guide.
- Miniature-scale maps for tactical combat with an optional 1 inch = 5 ft grid.
- Divided into pages for easy printing in full color or printer-friendly black and white.
- Selectable layers include: grid, black & white version, balconies, and optional objects.
- Uncut Map Images

• Two single-page PDF files containing 41x36 inch images of the Yoshida Stealth and Transport maps so you can see
the whole ship at once at 1 inch = 5 ft scale.
- Select either a light or dark background (for printing or projection/display).
- Includes layers for grid, black & white version, optional cargo, and background choice.

boardgame.name: Space Explorers: Play Mat
boardgame.description:
Create a more thematic central playing surface for your Space Explorers game experience with this themed play mat. It measures 14x24” and is double stitched to prevent pealing.

This neoprene and rubber play mat is used in the center play area in the game. Only one mat is needed per game, regardless of player count.

~from publisher's website

boardgame.name: Super Mario: Piranha Plant Escape!
boardgame.description:
Roll the die to determine how many place your Super Mario character must move on the game board. The number you land determines the number of chances to must take against this classic villain.

Watch out! The Piranha Plant will randomly attack and knock Mario and Luigi off of the game board.

Figures from the Piranha Plant Escape! are compatible with other Epoch Super Mario Games including Balancing Games and Blow up! Shaky Tower

Game includes easy-to-assemble Piranha Plant game board, 2 unique Super Mario Action Figures, 2 character plates and die.
boardgame.boardgamefamily: Video Game Theme: Super Mario Bros.

boardgame.name: Hindsight
boardgame.description:
2 player traditional card game, combining trick taking and melding. Players aim to win tricks with their playing hand, and to convert their stock into a spread of 13 cards containing melds scoring as high as possible. The melds are: 1 per card in its longest suit, plus 1 per card in its longest sequence, plus 2 for a pair, 3 for three of the same rank and 8 for four of a kind. Also: to announce in advance which of one's two scores - tricks or melds - will count double. Trick play has the unusual feature that you have to follow suit, but if you can't and play a card of the same rank it trumps and is worth 10 points. Tricks of the same suit are worth 2 and tricks of differing suits are worth 6.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Pest
boardgame.description:
Our once great Empire was struck by a devastating plague… will you answer the call to save it?

Once standing tall and great, we now need to rediscover and rebuild our fallen cities. There are still survivors among the ruins – we must take them in our care and cure them. In order to stay ahead of the plague, we must implement new inventions and technologies. Our influence will expand as we rebuild, but the plague will still lurk in the shadows, ready to strike when we least expect it. Once it does, it will be difficult to adapt, but we will survive. In addition to the procurement of important resources, our imperative will be to get the plague under control.

In Pest, players slip into the roles of leaders of the ruling houses of a once great empire that was struck by a cataclysmic plague. The plague has left much of the empire in ruins, so now it is up to the players to restore it to former glory.

Pest is played in 7 rounds. Each round before players take their turn, a plague card will be revealed which shows how the plague will spread in that round. On their turn, players will be able to select among many actions on their player board using a unique action selection system. Thus, players will be able to move their containment team on the board, quarantine and cure infected people, rebuild, assign workers, harvest for resources and more.

As their house influence grows, players will be able to play more actions, generate more resources, and house more people. This will bring forth new technological advancements which are much needed to get the plague under control.

The game ends after the 7 round is over and players count their final amount of Renown (victory points). The player with the most Renown is the winner and declared savior of the empire!

—description from publisher

boardgame.name: FRAME
LIGHT:FRAME
boardgame.description:
from inside PDF

FRAME is a tabletop RPG about ancient mechanized guardians, known as Frames, who were created to defend the Sol system from threats within and beyond. With it, you and your friends will tell the stories of these guardians, now risen from centuries of slumber in a system in desperate need for their aid. Wield your incredible powers, and strike back against those that would see your home torn apart.

boardgame.name: The Wild Hunt
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

A race across the North-Eastern U.S. to confound an ancient imported evil.

Desperate for some edge against those they see as rivals, a splinter of the Irish republican cause uses old tales and magicks to call forth an entity and his band known across Europe for chaos, death, and portents of doom. Their hubris in thinking they could control such a force leads to death and destruction way beyond their imaginings.

Can the investigators put down such an evil?
Will they see past a terrorist cause for the greater good?

For mature gamers only

'The Wild Hunt' is an adventure of 1-3 nights across the Boston-New York-Albany triangle in the 1920s but can be moved to a different time and place with a little work. This adventure deals with Irish republicanism and the I.R.A. so Keepers may need to discuss the suitability of the scenario with their players.

boardgame.name: Storabelt
boardgame.description:
This is a strategic game to scramble for the territory of the Scandinavia peninsula.
You choose one among seven actions and send soldiers to the battlefield and build the defensive wall.
When a certain territory was completely surrounded by the defensive wall, the player whom influence is higher in gets a score.
You can purchase a card strengthening own action to push forward a game strategically.
The card which you purchased finally gets a score in this way.
The winner of the game is the player who got more territories and achievements.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: My Name is Mayo 2
boardgame.description:
User Summary

My Name is Mayo 2 is the second game in the titular series where players click a jar of mayonnaise over and over again, gradually unlocking PlayStation trophies along the way. As players reach a certain threshold of clicks, they gain access to a new humorous short story that is gradually revealed to them as the player reaches each consecutive click goal. The mayonnaise jar will often change appearance based on the theme and subject matter of the current story.

Unlike its predecessor, this game contains mini games that the player will participate in, adding more gameplay than simply clicking. Ultimately, this game is designed to be a humorous clicker with easy trophies/achievements.

boardgame.name: Memory Lane
boardgame.description:
User Summary

A game designed to test the players memory skills by finding pairs of cards, just like the classic memory/matching card games from your youth. There are 4 distinct, themed card sets and over 150 individual cards to play with. As players progress, they will unlock new and interesting bits of information about how the human brain and memory works.

boardgame.name: Kobold-Kämpfe
boardgame.description: The players start at the lowest opposite spaces of the climbing frame and take turns rolling the die and move their meeple (only on the red part of the climbing frame). If a player can't move the rolled number of spaces forward, because he is blocked by the opposite player, he has to move backwards. If a player is forced to move back to his starting space he has lost the game.

boardgame.name: Abyss: Kraken & Leviathan
boardgame.description: An expansion box containing both Abyss: Kraken and Abyss: Leviathan.

boardgame.name: Sechs Schlösser im Schloss
boardgame.description:
The players start at the lower right corner of the game board and have to reach the treasure chamber at the end of the track. They take turns to roll the die and move their pawn accordingly. If a player reaches the space in front of a door, he has to use the special die to roll the key he needs to open the door. If he rolls a ghost he may pass the door without the key. The first player to reach the door of the treasure chamber and rolls the needed key wins the game.

—user summary

boardgame.name: Äpfel pflücken
boardgame.description:
At the beginning of the game all spaces on the tree are covered with an apple token. The players put their meeple on their starting space at the fruit basket und take turns to roll the die and move their meeple. If a meeple gets on a space with an apple, the player puts the apple inside his basket. If a meeple gets on a space on the tree with is already occupied by the opposite meeple, the later has to start anew from his starting space.

When all apples are plucked, the player with the most apples in his basket wins the game.

—user summary

boardgame.name: Pisa Fondo
boardgame.description:
A persecution game of cops against truck drivers.

You are a "red skin" in your "car", running on the asphalt, trying to be the first to go around the board.

In other words ... you are a driver (red skin) trying to be the first player to get a complete lap of the board to your starting point ... but you have to be careful ... two police cars (pale faces) and a helicopter (iron bird) are waiting to catch you speeding.
boardgame.boardgamefamily: Series: Álbum de Oro Club de la Aventura (CEFA)

boardgame.name: Rallye World
boardgame.description:
Run your adventure against wind and breakdown.

Rallye World is a game for reckless motorists, in which 2-8 players can participate.

The atmospheric situation and the multiple breakdowns that can occur to you during the tour, will make you an intrepid driver.

In the face of adversity, you will always have the invaluable help of your assistance truck, in which the best mechanics will get your car ready.

Your decisions made at the right moment will make ingenuity defeat mechanics.

You will drive your "car" from the high peaks of Europe to the most inhospitable desert in the world, where solitude will be your only company.

You are facing a real challenge, a true five-star adventure in your living room.

For you who are determined, sagacious and intelligent this game is made. Dare yourself!
boardgame.boardgamefamily: Series: Álbum de Oro Club de la Aventura (CEFA)

boardgame.name: Morning Coffee Dungeon: Deep Sea Adventure
boardgame.description:
Morning Coffee Dungeon is a dungeon crawling puzzle that can be completed with your morning cup of coffee. Limiting randomness to the treasure/loot drops, each delve into the dungeon is more a series of calculated decisions. Will you be able to complete the campaign with the most victory points?

Deep Sea Adventure: An underwater vessel has been discovered and you have been tasked with investigating. A stroke of bad luck has compromised your mission. Get what you can, treasures or creature samples, and escape before your air runs out!

Rules / How to Play

You may move your character to any spot. It may not move through walls or undefeated monsters.
If your character encounters a monster, resolve Battle in order.
You may leave the dungeon at any time. The total number of Victory Points (VP) earned is your score. If you lose all your health, you lose all your Victory Points.

Battle Rules (Complete in Order)

Calculate Damage: monster level - your level = damage to you, with a minimum of 0. Example: Monster Level 5 - Your Level 3 = 2 Damage to you.
Earn VP: if the monster is the same level or higher than your level, gain 1 VP.
Gain Level: if the monster is the same level or higher than your level, gain 1 Level.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Morning Coffee Dungeon: Just a Dungeon
boardgame.description:
Morning Coffee Dungeon is a dungeon crawling puzzle that can be completed with your morning cup of coffee. Limiting randomness to the treasure/loot drops, each delve into the dungeon is more a series of calculated decisions. Will you be able to complete the campaign with the most victory points?

Just a Dungeon: is a normal dungeon as any other. There are monsters. There are treasures. There is probably a mold problem. Our hero, Sadie Cat, finds themselves treasure hunting in hopes of finding some relief from their crippling student debt. Beware of gold thieves hiding in treasure chests!

What Do I Need to Play:

1d12
10 health chits / markers
10 level chits / markers
10 VP chits / markers

Rules / How to Play

You may move your character to any spot. It may not move through walls or undefeated monsters.
If your character encounters a monster, resolve Battle in order.
You may leave the dungeon at any time. The total number of Victory Points (VP) earned is your score. If you lose all your health, you lose all your Victory Points.

Battle Rules (Complete in Order)

Calculate Damage: monster level - your level = damage to you, with a minimum of 0. Example: Monster Level 5 - Your Level 3 = 2 Damage to you.
Earn VP: if the monster is the same level or higher than your level, gain 1 VP.
Gain Level: if the monster is the same level or higher than your level, gain 1 Level.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Morning Coffee Dungeon: Night At The Museum
boardgame.description:
Morning Coffee Dungeon is a dungeon crawling puzzle that can be completed with your morning cup of coffee. Limiting randomness to the treasure/loot drops, each delve into the dungeon is more a series of calculated decisions. Will you be able to complete the campaign with the most victory points?

Night At The Museum" There’s a bit of trouble at the museum and they’ve sent their best paranormal investigator to take care of it. Watch out for that frog creature! It really hops.

What Do I Need to Play:

1d12
1 hero marker
1 monster marker
3 bullet chits / markers
5 Victory Point chits / markers
10 Time chits / markers

Rules / How to Play

You may move your character to any spot. It may not move diagonally, through walls, or piles of rubble.
Your character may only attack a monster by shooting it.
If your character enters a new “jump” area, the monster jumps to a new spot.

Battle Rules (Complete in Order)

SHOOT: Your character may only shoot if it has bullets. Every bullet subtracts a Bullet.
SUCCESS: A successful shot is determined by rolling 1d12. It is successful if that value is larger than the distance between your character and the monster (shortest path, no diagonals, ignore Line of Sight rules). Success earns 1 VP.
JUMP: Any kind of shot, successful or not, results in the monster jumping to a new spot.
RELOAD: Replenish your Bullets to the maximum, but doing so forces the monster to jump.

MONSTER JUMPS

Roll 1d12 to determine where the monster jumps to. Whenever the monster jumps, you lose 1 Time.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Sadie Cat: Cook Out
boardgame.description:
Sadie Cat and Mao are out in the forest for the night and need to get some food in their stomachs. Sadie Cat sends Mao out to get some supplies, but he comes back with more than just ingredients. Now Sadie Cat is on the hook to feed a bunch of mouths and the sun is going down fast. How much food can she make in time?

What is Sadie Cat: Cook Out?

Sadie Cat: Cook Out is a dice rolling and matching game by Alexander Shen. Players roll numerous d6 and match them to the recipes that she knows. Each recipe takes a certain amount of time to cook and there is a limited amount of time left.

Do you like dice games? Do you like the puzzle-y bits of figuring out how to maximize your score? If you do, definitely give Sadie Cat: Cook Out a try!

—description form the designer

boardgame.name: Monster Healer Solo IIDX
boardgame.description:
In the past monster hunters were needed to control the outbreak of certain monsters in the area or ones that cause direct danger to our local communities, but these needs have decreased and have no longer been an issue for a very long time. Instead, there has been a recent increase of rogue monster hunters running around in the wildlands, slaying them for no reason other than for sport. It is my job to save these innocent monsters, bring them back to health, and reunite them with their packs. It requires luck. It requires traps constructed from what nature can provide to subdue the monsters for treatment. It’s a dangerous job, but it needs to be done.

Monster Healer Solo IIDX is a print-and-play dice game that has you doing your best to subdue a hurt monster so you can perform your doctorly duties to save it. Two monsters included in this version!

Basic Gameplay

You roll your trap dice and assign them to the traps required to stop the monster. When the monster takes its action, it may do damage to you (saving monsters is a tough business) or even shake off the traps.

Full Rules

Setup

Print out the Monster Healer Solo IIDX Demo game sheet.
Give yourself 5x 6-sided dice and place in the Unused Dice pool
Give yourself 3x Life Tokens
Give the monster 1x 6-sided die
Player goes first
Phases

Refresh Dice
Player Actions (2)
Monster Action
Refresh Dice

Move all dice from the Used Dice pool to the Unused Dice pool.

Player Action

Player chooses to perform any two of these actions (player may choose to do the same action twice):

Roll Any Unused Dice
Player may reroll any number of dice from the Unused Dice in their dice pool.
Remove Trap (1)
Player removes a single Trap die from the monster and adds it to the Used Dice pool.
Assign Trap (1)
Player assigns a single Trap die from the Unused Dice pool and adds it to an open matching Trap space on the monster.
Use a Player Power
Player selects all required dice from the Unused Dice pool to use a power. Place these dice into the Used Dice pool.
Monster Action

Roll 1d6 for the monster.
Perform the action associated with the result on the monster card.
Game End

The game ends as soon as the player has lost all of their Life Tokens or if all the Trap spaces on the monster card are filled.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Hard Rock Apocalypse Demo Rule Book
boardgame.description:
From itch.io:

This is a rules lite, demo version of the game Hard Rock Apocalypse. It is a post apocalyptic rock opera. Players called Stars use HALO weapons to manipulate reality and the elements in a battle against the Label. The Label is a force set on outlawing music throughout the Divided Wastes of America. Your Star will Rock, but how will they roll? That's up to you.

boardgame.name: Hard Rock Apocalypse Holiday Special
boardgame.description:
From itch.io:

This 2–4-hour gig will allow your band to experience the setting and mechanics of Hard Rock Apocalypse to familiarize yourself and your group with the game. You can use this scenario to learn the ins and outs of HRApoc, or you can drop it in during one of your ongoing tours! Make this your own!

boardgame.name: Skulls and Pumpkins
boardgame.description:
It’s that spooky time of year again where skulls and pumpkins are around every corner! Do you have what it takes to to be crowned Halloween Royalty?

Winning the Game

First player to win 5 rounds will be crowned Halloween Royalty! In the case where a player is unable to win 5 rounds, the player with the most rounds won will be crowned Defacto Halloween Royalty! If the game is still a tie, then it's a tie and both players turn into candy corn.

How to Play

Each player chooses one card and places it face down in front of them.
Each player reveals the card at the same time.
The player with the winning card wins the round.
Discard the played cards in their own respective discard piles face up, one for each player.

The Winning Card

If the cards share the same suit (i.e. skull vs skull or pumpkin vs pumpkin), the highest card wins.
If the cards are of different suits, the lowest card wins.
If the cards are the same, the round is a draw. Discard these cards.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Dash Away All
boardgame.description:
Players draw, flip, and swap cards to be the first to collect Santa's sleigh and all of the Elf Pets Reindeer cards to win the game.

All players will begin with six face down cards. On their turn a player draws a card and if it s a numbered card they put it in the appropriate slot of their card row. This will cause the face down card to flip and the player can place this card as well.

This continues until a player reveals a card they already have face up or a special card that can help a player or hinder another player.

The first player to have Santa's sleigh and all five reindeer face up in front of them wins!

boardgame.name: Pet shop
boardgame.description:
In the Pet Shop you have your own pet store, where you have to buy and sell animals and food. Decorate the store, by placing the animals you have for sale on your player board, and have customers visit. ​Who first earns enough money to buy the white, coveted cockatoo and earns $ 1,000.00?

Players buy animals and food, and each round a customer for each player is drawn from a deck of cards, the customer will buy a specific animal or set of animals. If the player have those for sale, they will earn money. After each round players get to restock with the money they earn. Eventually earning enough money to buy the Cockatoo - and be ready for the final sale when the right customer wants to buy, and thus winning the game.

boardgame.name: Star Wars: Scrabble
boardgame.description:
Visit a galaxy far, far away…. with Scrabble Brand Crossword Game: Star Wars Edition. Now you can launch your Scrabble game into hyperspace with two different ways to play: Enjoy classic Scrabble with Star Wars vocabulary added or try Galaxy Mode for a more immersive game experience. Galaxy Mode alters the method of scoring so players of all skill levels can enjoy the game.

In Galaxy Mode, the words you build allow you to move one of four iconic star ship movers the Millennium Falcon, Boba Fett's star ship, an X-wing, or a TIE fighter around the board to collect Galaxy Cards for powerups and points. The Star Wars glossary used for both games modes recognizes the vocabulary of the Empire, the Rebels, and everyone in between!

boardgame.name: The Dagger and the Dance
boardgame.description: You are a girl at a masquerade ball. You are going to dance with the King. Hidden in your dress is a dagger, sharp and waiting…
